Services.serviceDiscription: Optical fiber connections provided in not only in your cabins but rather to all of the BriSphere scenic working spaces and dinning areas.

Designed for working professionals with spacious interiors, comfortable beds and sleekly attached kitchen are some of the comforts providedin your space.
